author: GameSpot
description:
Xenoblade Chronicles X gets a second shot at life with a Definitive Edition on the Nintendo Switch. Jake joins Kurt on the GameSpot Show to explain why this is important.

#GameSpot #xenoblade #xenobladechronicles #xenobladechroniclesx #switch #nintendo 

0:00 - Jake Joins Kurt On The GameSpot Show
2:40 - What's Different About Xenoblade Chronicles X?
7:24 - Where Does Xenoblade Chronicles X Fit In?
title: Why Xenoblade Chronicles X Is Important

author: GameSpot
description:
Jordan Ramee, our Assassin's Creed expert joins Kurt Indovina on the GameSpot Show to talk us through his 8/10 review of Assassin's Creed Shadows.

#Gamespot #review #assassinscreed #assassinscreedshadows 

0:00 - Jordan Ramee Joins Kurt Indovina On The GameSpot Show
1:08 - Jordan Talks Through His 8/10 Review Of Assassin's Creed Shadows
3:50 - What Makes Assassin's Creed Different From Other Games?
5:00 - Explaining The 2 Protagonists In Assassin's Creed Shadows
10:24 - How The Weather System Changes How You Approach The Game
13:25 - The 1-Word Answer For What Makes Assassin's Creed Shadows Worthwhile
15:41 - Should Assassin's Creed Continue To Have Multiple Playable Protagonists?
title: Why We Gave Assassin's Creed Shadows An 8

author: GameSpot
description: Jeff Grubb and Jan Ochoa chat about an industry-wide union forming for video game developers to help build community and protections for those in the industry.
title: Game Developers Launching an Industry-Wide Union

author: GameSpot
description:
GameSpot and Giant Bomb are teaming up for The Power Block, an all day livestream featuring breaking news, coverage on the latest games, let's plays, and more!

Schedule (Times listed in PST)
9am - GameBreaking News
10am - The GameSpot Show
10:30am - Half Life 2 RTX
12pm - Voicemail Dump Truck
title: 🔴LIVE! Half Life 2 RTX, Assassin's Creed Shadows & Xenoblade Chronicles X Review | POWER BLOCK 3/20
